articles.title: Floyd Mayweather Names the ‘Pound-for-Pound Best Fighter in Boxing Right Now’ - EssentiallySports
articles.description: Undefeated five-division world champion Floyd Mayweather has named the current pound-for-pound best boxer and it's not Canelo Alvarez.
articles.content: TBE Floyd Mayweather was the pound-for-pound best boxer during his glittery career that lasted for over two decades. Having faced 50 opponents as a professional, Mayweather remained undefeated with 2… [+3239 chars]

articles.author: Chris Wheeler
articles.title: Harry Maguire insists Man United players MUST take responsibility for Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's sacking - Daily Mail
articles.description: CHRIS WHEELER: Solskjaer was axed after three years in charge on Sunday, 24 hours after a 4-1 defeat at Watford left United eighth in the Premier League.
articles.content:
Harry Maguire admits Manchester United's players have to take their share of the blame for Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's sacking.
Solskjaer was axed after three years in charge on Sunday, 24 hours after a … [+2502 chars]

articles.title: Tyson Fury admits who he wants to face next 'doesn't make sense' with Dillian Whyte next in line - Daily Mail
articles.description: Whyte is set to be the man next in line to have a shot at Fury's belt but the Body Snatcher's ongoing legal dispute with the WBC has left that bout up in the air for the time being.
articles.content:
